mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( user_no, user_nm, user_rank, user_pos, user_email, user_pwd, user_phone, group_no, user_deleted, insert_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{userNm}, #{userRank}, #{userPos}, #{userEmail}, #{userPwd}, #{userPhone}, #{groupNo}, '0', now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET userNm=#{userNm}, userRank=#{userRank}, userPos=#{userPos}, userPhone=#{userPhone}, groupNo=#{groupNo}, groupNm=#{groupNm} update_time = now() WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND user_email = #{userEmail}
mapper.delete: DELETE from user WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND user_email = #{userEmail}
